description: Property tax due dates and payment cycles by state

CA.notes: First installment due November 1, second due February 1

FL.notes: Due November 1, discounts for early payment

IL.notes: Due dates vary by county; these are Cook County dates

MI.notes: Summer taxes due July 1, winter taxes due December 1

NJ.notes: Quarterly payments due on the 1st of Feb, May, Aug, Nov

NY.notes: Varies by county/municipality; NYC has quarterly payments

PA.notes: County taxes due March 31, school and municipal taxes vary

TX.notes: Due January 31 for the previous tax year
